name: Banana Racer - Moto Racing
description:
Banana Racer - Moto Racing is a fun speed casual motorcycle dirt bike Racing and Challenge freestyle game.
The game has great motorbike physics and very good control. Perform great dirt motocross acrobatics at high speed.
Starts easy and evolves in difficult for the most hardcore game players. Stunt race games!
Play motorbike freestyle dirt races with challenges at full speed, be the fastest.

Play Mode:
- Racing Mode - Win the 30 Races against the grape and the moisture bug!
- Challenge Mode has Races levels and challenge to accomplish and unlock Racing Mode.
- Play random motorcycle freestyle unlock levels.
- Race against your best plays - VS your best Ghost.
- Stunt Race!

Features:
- MFI Game Controllers Supported.
- 120fps for ProMotion devices.
- Game Center Achievements, LeaderBoards & Challenges.
- World Rankings.
- Universal App - Buy one time and you can play in supported iPhone, iPod touch, iPad and Apple TV.
- Dynamic icon 3D Touch Shortcuts support (for 3D Touch support devices).
- Haptic Feedback (only on iPhone 7 or newer)
- Great bike motorcycle dirt physics.
- Precise controls.
- Free iMessage stickers included!!

Feel free to post or contact us with suggestions and ideas.

Contact:
